original_text: They took the things Moses commanded to the front of the tent of meeting, and the entire assembly came near and stood before the Lord.
korean_text: 그들이 모세가 명령한 모든 것을 회막 앞으로 가져오고 온 회중이 나아와 여호와 앞에 선지라

sentences.original_text: They took the things Moses commanded
to the front of the tent of meeting
and the entire assembly came near
